associatetrackerconsumer.name: AssociateTrackerConsumer
associatetrackerconsumer.description: Grants permission to create an association between a geofence-collection and a tracker resource

batchdeletedevicepositionhistory.name: BatchDeleteDevicePositionHistory
batchdeletedevicepositionhistory.description: Grants permission to delete a batch of device position histories from a tracker resource

batchdeletegeofence.name: BatchDeleteGeofence
batchdeletegeofence.description: Grants permission to delete a batch of geofences from a geofence collection

batchevaluategeofences.name: BatchEvaluateGeofences
batchevaluategeofences.description: Grants permission to evaluate device positions against the position of geofences in a given geofence collection

batchgetdeviceposition.name: BatchGetDevicePosition
batchgetdeviceposition.description: Grants permission to send a batch request to retrieve device positions

batchputgeofence.name: BatchPutGeofence
batchputgeofence.description: Grants permission to send a batch request for adding geofences into a given geofence collection

batchupdatedeviceposition.name: BatchUpdateDevicePosition
batchupdatedeviceposition.description: Grants permission to upload a position update for one or more devices to a tracker resource

calculateroute.name: CalculateRoute
calculateroute.description: Grants permission to calculate routes using a given route calculator resource

calculateroutematrix.name: CalculateRouteMatrix
calculateroutematrix.description: Grants permission to calculate a route matrix using a given route calculator resource

creategeofencecollection.name: CreateGeofenceCollection
creategeofencecollection.description: Grants permission to create a geofence-collection

createkey.name: CreateKey
createkey.description: Grants permission to create an API key resource

createmap.name: CreateMap
createmap.description: Grants permission to create a map resource

createplaceindex.name: CreatePlaceIndex
createplaceindex.description: Grants permission to create a place index resource

createroutecalculator.name: CreateRouteCalculator
createroutecalculator.description: Grants permission to create a route calculator resource

createtracker.name: CreateTracker
createtracker.description: Grants permission to create a tracker resource

deletegeofencecollection.name: DeleteGeofenceCollection
deletegeofencecollection.description: Grants permission to delete a geofence-collection

deletekey.name: DeleteKey
deletekey.description: Grants permission to delete an API key resource

deletemap.name: DeleteMap
deletemap.description: Grants permission to delete a map resource

deleteplaceindex.name: DeletePlaceIndex
deleteplaceindex.description: Grants permission to delete a place index resource

deleteroutecalculator.name: DeleteRouteCalculator
deleteroutecalculator.description: Grants permission to delete a route calculator resource

deletetracker.name: DeleteTracker
deletetracker.description: Grants permission to delete a tracker resource

describegeofencecollection.name: DescribeGeofenceCollection
describegeofencecollection.description: Grants permission to retrieve geofence collection details

describekey.name: DescribeKey
describekey.description: Grants permission to retrieve API key resource details and secret

describemap.name: DescribeMap
describemap.description: Grants permission to retrieve map resource details

describeplaceindex.name: DescribePlaceIndex
describeplaceindex.description: Grants permission to retrieve place-index resource details

describeroutecalculator.name: DescribeRouteCalculator
describeroutecalculator.description: Grants permission to retrieve route calculator resource details

describetracker.name: DescribeTracker
describetracker.description: Grants permission to retrieve a tracker resource details

disassociatetrackerconsumer.name: DisassociateTrackerConsumer
disassociatetrackerconsumer.description: Grants permission to remove the association between a tracker resource and a geofence-collection

forecastgeofenceevents.name: ForecastGeofenceEvents
forecastgeofenceevents.description: Grants permission to forecast events for geofences stored in a given geofence collection

getdeviceposition.name: GetDevicePosition
getdeviceposition.description: Grants permission to retrieve the latest device position

getdevicepositionhistory.name: GetDevicePositionHistory
getdevicepositionhistory.description: Grants permission to retrieve the device position history

getgeofence.name: GetGeofence
getgeofence.description: Grants permission to retrieve the geofence details from a geofence-collection

getmapglyphs.name: GetMapGlyphs
getmapglyphs.description: Grants permission to retrieve the glyph file for a map resource

getmapsprites.name: GetMapSprites
getmapsprites.description: Grants permission to retrieve the sprite file for a map resource

getmapstyledescriptor.name: GetMapStyleDescriptor
getmapstyledescriptor.description: Grants permission to retrieve the map style descriptor from a map resource

getmaptile.name: GetMapTile
getmaptile.description: Grants permission to retrieve the map tile from the map resource

getplace.name: GetPlace
getplace.description: Grants permission to find a place by its unique ID

listdevicepositions.name: ListDevicePositions
listdevicepositions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of devices and their latest positions from the given tracker resource

listgeofences.name: ListGeofences
listgeofences.description: Grants permission to list geofences stored in a given geofence collection

listkeys.name: ListKeys
listkeys.description: Grants permission to list API key resources

listmaps.name: ListMaps
listmaps.description: Grants permission to list map resources

listplaceindexes.name: ListPlaceIndexes
listplaceindexes.description: Grants permission to return a list of place index resources

listroutecalculators.name: ListRouteCalculators
listroutecalculators.description: Grants permission to return a list of route calculator resources

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags (metadata) which you have assigned to the resource

listtrackerconsumers.name: ListTrackerConsumers
listtrackerconsumers.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of geofence collections currently associated to the given tracker resource

listtrackers.name: ListTrackers
listtrackers.description: Grants permission to return a list of tracker resources

putgeofence.name: PutGeofence
putgeofence.description: Grants permission to add a new geofence or update an existing geofence to a given geofence-collection

searchplaceindexforposition.name: SearchPlaceIndexForPosition
searchplaceindexforposition.description: Grants permission to reverse geocodes a given coordinate

searchplaceindexforsuggestions.name: SearchPlaceIndexForSuggestions
searchplaceindexforsuggestions.description: Grants permission to generate suggestions for addresses and points of interest based on partial or misspelled free-form text

searchplaceindexfortext.name: SearchPlaceIndexForText
searchplaceindexfortext.description: Grants permission to geocode free-form text, such as an address, name, city or region

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to adds to or modifies the tags of the given resource. Tags are metadata which can be used to manage a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the given tags (metadata) from the resource

updategeofencecollection.name: UpdateGeofenceCollection
updategeofencecollection.description: Grants permission to update a geofence collection

updatekey.name: UpdateKey
updatekey.description: Grants permission to update an API key resource

updatemap.name: UpdateMap
updatemap.description: Grants permission to update a map resource

updateplaceindex.name: UpdatePlaceIndex
updateplaceindex.description: Grants permission to update a place index resource

updateroutecalculator.name: UpdateRouteCalculator
updateroutecalculator.description: Grants permission to update a route calculator resource

updatetracker.name: UpdateTracker
updatetracker.description: Grants permission to update a tracker resource

verifydeviceposition.name: VerifyDevicePosition
verifydeviceposition.description: Grants permission to verify a device position
